prompt_base: hyperdetailed portrait of a massive rotund alien, vibrant bubblegum pink rubbery texture, short black antennae, large black beady eyes, menacing grin, otherworldly presence, 8k cinematic photo, dramatic lighting
feature_prompt: microscopic detail on the matte rubber surface, subtle skin imperfections, sharp focus on eyes and gold buckle, detailed fabric texture on puffy garment, otherworldly aura
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic texture, human proportions, smooth skin, human, friendly face, low quality, overly shiny, flat lighting, (too cute:1.4), baby, tiny
